trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> is interrupted while it is in a waiting state.
After a thread is created, it is in one or more <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState> states until it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 创建线程后，它是一个或多<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState>状态中，直到它被销毁。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A> when a thread is in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin> state will cause a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> to be thrown in the target thread.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Interrupt%2A>当线程处于<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>状态将导致<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>目标线程中引发。

trans-unit.source: If the thread is not in the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin> state, the exception is not thrown until the thread enters that state.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程处于<xref:System.Threading.ThreadState.WaitSleepJoin>状态，直到该线程进入该状态，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the thread never blocks, it could complete without ever being interrupted.
trans-unit.target: 如果线程永远不被阻止，则它可在不被中断的情况下完成。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED, which has the value 0x80131519.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_THREADINTERRUPTED，其值 0x80131519。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>, see the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>，请参阅<xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the behavior of a running thread when it is interrupted and subsequently gets blocked.
trans-unit.target: 在中断并随后被阻止时，下面的代码示例将显示正在运行的线程的行为。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with default properties.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with a specified error message.
The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with serialized data.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Threading.ThreadInterruptedException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
